item.description:
Hi all,

Wanted to share some of the wind-down stuff I do. I try and get out on the water as often as I can before the season wraps up.

Thursday should be a good break from the rain, so why not come out and paddle a big puddle with us. We'll be checking out Long Pond in Pelham/Dracut. Put-in/take-out is at the Veteran's park off of Mammoth Road.

This will be another easy loop - 1 1/2 hours or so of light for us to make it around the pond and as of right now, everyone's got just under 3 days to get there. So you tortoises, no excuse to be late! ;)

Plenty of parking, so bring a friend or more and lets try to make a kayak traffic jam on this little pond as we watch the sun go down over the water.

Contact me with any questions. Text/phone 603.557.6055 or email - bill@imaginetworks.com
item.name: After-work kayak paddle - Long Pond
